description:
Provide seamless access to GrabMaps geocoding and routing services across 8 countries in Southeast Asia through a standardized MCP interface. Enable AI models and applications to perform place searches, reverse geocoding, route calculations, and place detail retrieval efficiently. Simplify integration with GrabMaps data via AWS Location Service without requiring direct map rendering capabilities.

capabilities.name: searchPlaceIndexForText
capabilities.description: Search for places using text query. GrabMaps supports 8 Southeast Asian countries: Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Myanmar, Cambodia, Vietnam, Philippines, Indonesia.

capabilities.name: searchPlaceIndexForPosition
capabilities.description: Search for places by coordinates (reverse geocoding). Supports Southeast Asia only.

capabilities.name: searchPlaceIndexForSuggestions
capabilities.description: Get place suggestions based on partial text input. Supports Southeast Asia only.

capabilities.name: getPlace
capabilities.description: Get place details by place ID. Supports Southeast Asia only.

capabilities.name: calculateRoute
capabilities.description: Calculate a route between two points. Supports Car, Truck, Walking, Bicycle, Motorcycle modes.

capabilities.name: calculateRouteMatrix
capabilities.description: Calculate route matrix between multiple origins and destinations.
